description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Project Management

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Project Management

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

Introduction to Project Management,
Basic Principles of Management,
Role of Project Manager,
Project Basics,
Strategic Planning,
Project Communication,
Feasibility Study,
Scope Management,
Time Management,
Quality Management,
Risk Management,
Cost Management,
Human Resource Management,
Procurement Management,
Writing Project Proposals,
Business Plan Writing,
PERT and CPM,
Example of CPM,
Example of PERT.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Introduction of Project Management,
Quiz on Project Basics,
Quiz on Scope Time Quality and Risk Management,
Quiz on Human Resources and Procurement Management,
Quiz on PERT and CPM.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
